mapper.sql: select ml.id, ml.major_id, ml.user_id, ml.remark, ml.create_by, ml.create_time, ml.update_by, ml.update_time, ml.del_flag, m.major_name, u.user_name as user_name, u.nick_name as nick_name from tb_major_lead ml left join tb_major m on m.id = ml.major_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = ml.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_major_lead (major_id, user_id, remark, create_by, create_time, del_flag) values (#{majorId}, #{userId}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, '0')
mapper.delete: delete from tb_major_lead where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select distinct user_id from tb_major_lead where id in #{id}

select m.id, m.major_name, m.status, m.remark, m.del_flag from tb_major_lead ml inner join tb_major m on m.id = ml.major_id where ml.user_id = #{userId} and ml.del_flag = '0' and m.del_flag = '0' order by m.id asc
